subject: Group Life Insurance for the employees of NHAI-reg.
text: Hray <4t <Af Mearrut QM Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (375 Wawt & <tri 47a4) WaR / Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 1i-5 V 6, #azr-10, aRa, # fet-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Group Life Insurance/2018 Policy No.1.3.2.25, Dated the July, 2018 Sub: Group Life Insurance for the employees of NHAI Reference circular no. NHAI/11041/27/2005-Admin-III dated 22.08.2005 on the subject (Copy attached): 2. Consequent upon decision taken in the meeting of the Authority held on 22nd October 2013, para-viii of ibid circular is amended as below: "The Authority has decided that the group insurance   scheme for NHAI's employees shall be funded though annual budget of NHAl we:f January 2014". 3. The rest provisions of the ibid circular remains unchanged: (V.K. Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord.) To 1 AIl Officers at NHAI HQROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices 2.
